item.description:
Please join the Rhode Island Atheist Society at the 9th annual "Honoring the Harvest" celebration. From the Haffenreffer Museum of Anthropology website:

"The 9th annual Honoring the Harvest celebration, sponsored by the Bristol Parks and Recreation Department, will be located on the Mount Hope Grant in Bristol in the Outing Reservation Building on November 6 from 11:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. This celebration of the fall harvest will be led by Native Americans from the Pokanoket Wampanoag community. Join us for a feast of succotash, cornbread, pumpkin bread, and cider while enjoying dancing, drumming, and craft activities. The program is co-sponsored by the Friends of the Haffenreffer Museum of Anthropology."

For more specifics check out the Museum's website: http://www.brown.edu/...

I hope you can make it to this family friendly event!
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet at the entrance to the building.
item.name: Rhode Island Atheist Society - "Honoring the Harvest" Celebration
